channel.title: Safezones

item.title: Safezones
item.dc:creator: @Sir_Jay Sir Jay
item.description:
@Sir_Jay wrote:

I have been told that you make quicker safezones with:

public boolean inwildy = false; public boolean inwildy2 = false; public void checkwildy() { if ((absY <= 10112 && absY >= 3970) || (absY <= 3672)) { inwildy = true; } else { inwildy = true; } } public void checkwildy2() { if ((absY <= 10112 && absY >= 3970) || (absY <= 3514)) { inwildy2 = true; } else { inwildy2 = true; } }

But i donâ€™t know the proper use, can somebody show meh?
